snippet.title: SNES Longplay - Clock Tower: The First Fear (Fan Translation)
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: Lemmy556

One of the first survival horror games ever, where you play as Jennifer Simpson trying to get out from the Barrows mansion and hopefully find some of her friends alive!

I recommend to play this game before watching this longplay. This is an interesting game with multiple endings and gameplay choices, but really short when you know what to do. The lack of knowledge of all the clues and dangers of the mansion makes the game much more interesting and fun to play!

The playthrought includes the best S-ending, all the other endings and bunch of other stuff from the game I didn't include in the main playthrought.

I missed some of the stuff, mostly the ones that happen randomly like bleeding painting, music player playing itself etc, but I included pretty much everything that can be triggered by player itself. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
